title: Episode 35 - The Iran Crisis 1945-50 - Early Cold War in the Middle East
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode we examine the early Cold War in the Middle East from a general perspective and examine the first Crisis in the Middle East the Iran Crisis. Learn about the politics of the region ? How did the US become involved in the region and how were the nations in the region influenced by the early Cold War?
